sentences:
Sentence 0:
The best engineered strain using high-throughput fermentation produced squalene from glucose at 5.4 +- 0.3 mg/g and 105.3 +- 3.0 mg/L, which was a 5.2-fold increase over the parental strain.

Sentence 1:
In addition, flask cultivation of C. glutamicum overexpressing the dxs and idi genes with squalene synthase gene and repressing the idsA gene resulted in production of squalene at 5.8 +- 0.4 mg/g and 82.8 +- 6.2 mg/L, which was a 3.4-fold increase over the parental strain.
sentence_raw: The best engineered strain using high-throughput fermentation produced squalene from glucose at 5.4 +- 0.3 mg/g   and 105.3 +- 3.0 mg/L, which was a 5.2-fold increase over the parental strain.

In addition, flask cultivation of C. glutamicum overexpressing the dxs and idi genes with squalene synthase gene and repressing the idsA gene resulted in production of squalene at 5.8 +- 0.4 mg/g  and 82.8 +- 6.2 mg/L, which was a 3.4-fold increase over the parental strain.
